page.title: 18CHISLET MY DAY
page.content: I usually get up about 6 o'clock am. My dad goes to work about 7.OO am he sometimes gets my cereal in the morning. I live in Marshside - we have a field of about 2 acres and we keep my pony in the field. We used to keep sheep, ducks, chickens, dogs, cats, rabbits, fish and two guinea pigs, but now we only have a dog, 2 cats and a horse but we are going to get them all back. I go to Chislet School it is a small village school and we only have 52 children. Our head teacher is a man. I have quite a lot of friends one of them lives in Marshside. There are loads of people who have horses, I belong to a riding club and we do a lot of events on our horses.
